intro: Impatiens taishunensis, commonly known as the Taishun impatiens, is a species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Balsaminaceae and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that typically come in shades of red, pink, and white. The plant features opposite, ovate leaves with serrated edges, and it thrives in moist, shaded environments. It is often found in forest understories, where it contributes to the biodiversity of its native habitat.
